Package model.sound

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
model.sound.Sound
public class Sound extends Object
it stores and manages all the sounds (songs and sounds effects) of the game
Author:
MP

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sound()
    it constructs a Sound object and adds all the songs and sounds effects to the soundURL array

  • Method Details

    • setFile

      public void setFile(int i)
      set the songs/sound effect that is going to be played
      Parameters:
      i - the index of the songs/sound effect that will be taken from the array (soundURL)

      it will play the song/sound effect

      it will stop the song/sound effect
